mapper.insert: INSERT INTO director VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(director_id),0)+1 FROM director), #{directorName}, #{directorAge})
mapper.update: UPDATE director SET director_name = #{directorName}, director_age = #{directorAge} WHERE director_id = #{directorId}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, D.* FROM (SELECT * FROM director WHERE director_id != 0
AND director_name like '%'||#{searchDirector}||'%'
ORDER BY director_id ) D ) ORDER BY rnum DESC
